25.m: You make known to me the path of life; in your presence there is fullness of joy; at your right hand are pleasures forevermore. - Psalm 16:11 (ESV)

l.q: What happens those who run after other gods?
l.a: the sorrows of those who run after other gods multiply.

l.q: What are the benefits of taking refuge in God?
l.a: God charts the paths of those who take refuge in Him. Their counsel is from the Lord, and they won't easily stumble in times of temptations and come out strong in the Lord in times of trials. In them are life and they are filled with joy. God has a beautiful inheritance for them.

s.h:
Pleased as man with men to dwell 
 Jesus, our Emmanuel

25.a: Enjoy a cup of warm chocolate or apple cider with someone who lives with you.
